oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Battles that I have participated in during this Bloody War"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: List of battles, handwritten by Joseph Warren Van Meter (1837-1903), identifies the battles in which he fought. Battle sites include those in Kentucky, Tennessee, Georgia, and North Carolina. Dates and commanding officers also are named. Van Meter served in two regiments: Co. K, 7th Ark. Inf. Regt., CSA and Co. E, 1st Ark. Inf. Regt., CSA."
